version_description:
1. Improve accuracy at high speed （above 170 bpm）
2. Add sensor sensitivity setting on Watch,You can tune the sensor more sensitively.

You can send Debug Log to help us improve YaoYao.

1. Improve accuracy at high speed （above 170 bpm）
2. Add sensor sensitivity setting on Watch,You can tune the sensor more sensitively.

You can send Debug Log to help us improve YaoYao.

1. Now you can Configure YaoYao to watch faces in the gallery area of the Apple Watch app on iPhone.
2. Add Statistics view of week/month/year
3. New medal

1. Now you can Configure YaoYao to watch faces in the gallery area of the Apple Watch app on iPhone.
2. Add Statistics view of week/month/year
3. New medal

very sorry about that

1. live count: count will show on YaoYao iOS App when you jump
2. you can change voice tip interval on Watch App now

duplicated notification .

fix:
duplicated notification .

Chinese software engineers are protesting against the country’s 996 work schedule.
An unleagal work schedule (9a.m. ~ 9p.m., 6 days a week) .
Search 996.icu to support us !!

中国的程序员正在网上发起反抗 996 工作制的运动
“996”工作制，即每天早 9 点到岗，一直工作到晚上 9 点，每周工作

Happy New Year of 2020, the first version of the new year, we redesigned the homepage, and insist on exercise to fill the color blocks!
We add the game level, you can upgrade your level like playing a game, add YaoYao to the complication of your watch,

Happy New Year of 2020, the first version of the new year, we redesigned the homepage, and insist on exercise to fill the color blocks!
We add the game level, you can upgrade your level like playing a game, add YaoYao to the complication of your watch,

YaoYao supports "Double Under" counting now, Double Under jump can get two points to upgrade experience value!
The new Double Under Medal is waiting for you to win!

Double Under algorithm is currently under further optimization. If you feel in

We are localizing YaoYao into more languages so that more people can live healthier lives.

Watch App Setting:
- Voice Tip: add heart rate vibration alert feedback, convenient for you to control your heart rate in the specified zones when you jump. (Please wear the strap tightly when jumping rope, so as to avoid inaccurate heart rate data)

- Voice Tip: add heart rate vibration alert feedback, convenient for you to control your heart rate in the specified zones when you jump. (Please wear the strap tightly when jumping rope, so as to avoid inaccurate heart rate data)
